name: QualityPoint Technologies
tag_list: applicationdevelopment, webdevelopment, php, mysql, c, dotnet, javascript, test-automation, qtp, quick-test-professional, joomla, ajax, software, webdesign, webcrawl, autopost, bookmarklet
overview:
QualityPoint Technologies is Software Development Company located in Chennai and Ottapidaram(Tuticorin District), India.QualityPoint Technologies is Started in 2008. QualityPoint Technologies is focusing on Application development and Web development using Microsoft Technologies and Open Source, and experts in Test automation using Quick Test Professional. QualityPoint Technologies has done many projects using php/mysql/C# cost effectively with quality. QualityPoint Technologies has used php extensively including GDLibray and cURL. And also, QualityPoint Technologies is familiar in javascript including Ajax and bookmarklet.

QualityPoint Technologies is following best practices in Development and Testing to deliver Quality product.

And also, QualityPoint Technologies has helped their client to complete Reverse Auction website by successfully doing a complex algorithm to find best price.

Apart from this, QualityPoint Technologies is having good exposure to financial domain such as Letter of Credits (LC) and Credit Default Swap (CDS).

QualityPoint Technologies team is getting stronger each and every day by developing Programming Skills, Communication Skills and Team Spirit.

Read QualityPoint Technologies News Letter @ http://qualitypoint.blogspot.com/2009/12/news-letter.html
